g.text: ZETA Client has Resource Server FQDN (RS-FQDN)
Client: 200 OK; json body with Well-Known json Document (RFC8414)
200 OK; json body with Well-Known json Document (RFC8414)
create Client Assertion JWT with nonce
add SM-B Signature to Client Assertion JWT
verify Client Assertion JWT and DPoP JWT
verify Refresh token and DPoP JWT
issue Access and Refresh token with DPoP Binding
200 OK, Access token, Refresh token, bound to DPoP
verify Access token and DPoP Proof
with header and header content as json
